description: This file defines the Note entity class for an Android app, used with Room persistence library to represent notes with fields such as id, title, content, category, and creation timestamp. It includes constructors, getters, setters, an equality override, and a method to generate a content snippet.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class representing a note with properties for id, title, content, category, and createdAt timestamp, used with Room database.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a new Note instance with title, content, category, and sets createdAt to current time.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Getter for the note's creation timestamp.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Setter for the note's creation timestamp.

methods.name: getSnippet
methods.description: Returns a truncated snippet of the content, up to 64 characters, appending an ellipsis if content is longer.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Overrides Object.equals() to compare notes based on id, title, content, category, and createdAt.
